issue.title: rendering::DepthCamera does not output colors properly for an RGB PointCloud.

content.raw:
I'm seeing similar behavior in ROS-Indigo/Gazebo 2.0.  However, in my case, my orange robot shows up as blue.

Does anyone know if this has been fixed in a new version of Gazebo?  Is there a better depth camera simulation?  It seems odd that the simulated depth camera/kinect has these issues since it is so popular among roboticists.
content.html:
I'm seeing similar behavior in ROS-Indigo/Gazebo 2.0. However, in my case, my orange robot shows up as blue.

Does anyone know if this has been fixed in a new version of Gazebo? Is there a better depth camera simulation? It seems odd that the simulated depth camera/kinect has these issues since it is so popular among roboticists.
